name: Fateful Fears
description: Fateful Fears is a platform game that requires strategy and skill to pass the levels, created for an internal 7 days game jam,   by a small team within Gamecoder Academy, consisting of: Denisse Garnica Sánchez, Robert (Mejudirac) Cruz, Aideé Pfau Teshiba and Pamela (Ela.Giin) Guerrero. Musical credits: RealMrSnuggles.
